articles.title: Zuckerberg’s AI hires disrupt Meta with swift exits and threats to leave
articles.description: Longtime acolytes are sidelined as CEO directs biggest leadership reorganization in two decades.

articles.title: Google warns that mass data theft hitting Salesloft AI agent has grown bigger
articles.description: Assume all Salesloft credentials are compromised after Workspace breach, Google says.

articles.description: Vulnerability can be exploited to gain access to customers' crown jewels.

articles.description: Researchers take note: When the endpoint is compromised, all bets are off.

articles.title: The personhood trap: How AI fakes human personality
articles.description: AI assistants don't have fixed personalities—just patterns of output guided by humans.

articles.title: Anthropic’s auto-clicking AI Chrome extension raises browser-hijacking concerns
articles.description: Malicious websites can embed invisible commands that AI agents will follow blindly.

articles.title: OpenAI admits ChatGPT safeguards fail during extended conversations
articles.description: ChatGPT allegedly provided suicide encouragement to teen after moderation safeguards failed.

articles.title: Senator castigates federal judiciary for ignoring “basic cybersecurity”
articles.description: Breaches in 2020 and 2025, reportedly by foreign adversaries, exposed confidential files.

articles.title: With AI chatbots, Big Tech is moving fast and breaking people
articles.description: Why AI chatbots validate grandiose fantasies about revolutionary discoveries that don't exist.

articles.title: College student’s “time travel” AI experiment accidentally outputs real 1834 history
articles.description: Hobbyist training AI on Victorian texts gets an unexpected history lesson from his own creation.
